## Converting from `distill`

### Change the YAML

YAML items that ported over include: title, description, author, date, categories

Items that needed to be changed:
- `preview` to `image`
- `output: distill::distill_article` to nothing (although you will set `format: html` in the `_quarto.yml`)
- drop `base_url` from each article - add to `_quarto.yml`

I also had a lot of use for things like tabsets from `xaringanExtra`, `<aside>` from `distill` and lots of broken code from 3 years ago ðŸ™ƒ.

You're in charge of creating sub-folders and file names, so you can either revert back to `distill` style posts with kebab-case dates eg:

`posts/2022-04-25-blog-with-quarto/blog-with-quarto.qmd`

Or start with an alternative format like splitting by date:

`posts/2022/04/25/index.qmd`

:::{.callout-tip collapse="true"}
